wikipedia_page.main: Frank Edwin Shipway (9 July 1935 – 6 August 2014) was a British conductor.

response: The son of two pianists, Emmanuele Baldini was attracted to the violin when he was seven years old. Baldini started his studies with Bruno Polli at the Conservatorio di Musica Giuseppe Tartini, in Trieste. He then went to the Conservatoire de Musique de Genève, where he was taught by Corrado Romano, after which he further continued his studies with Ruggiero Ricci at the Salzburg's Mozarteum. Much later, he also studied conducting with Frank Shipway and Isaac Karabtchevsky.
